title: The Pale Elf
tags: how to unlock the pale elf
content:
ings? Are you willing? Why not maintain distance? Cazador's ritual hinges on finding you. 'Ourselves'? Perhaps you mean yourself. At times, your intimidation surpasses the elder brain's. Let's proceed.

Opt for the third choice, and Astarion concurs. He asserts that by augmenting his power, the entire team benefits. He queries if you remain steadfast. Respond:

We're a team. I've got your back. What if this is a trap? I'm uncertain. Shall we go? We've obtained what's needed – the ritual's locati
